title: Citi CFO John Gerspach to Present at RBC Capital Markets 2018 Financial Institutions Conference
summary: New York - John Gerspach, Chief Financial Officer of Citigroup, will present at RBC Capital Markets 2018 Financial Institutions Conference on Tuesday, March 6, 2018. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 10:40 a.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
